title: I Want to Know More and More
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Hmm.... This new outfit looks lovely too....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe, I’m glad to hear that from you, Nozomi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’ve always thought about it, but how do you always know what I’m thinking, Kotori-chan? Like, if there are 9 different outfits, you know which one I would like, how do you do it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eh....? How, you ask.... I just do, I guess?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Mhmm, to be able to see through everything just like that! As expected of Kotori-chan~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eeeh!? It’s not that I understand everything or anything like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Just kidding~. Sorry, I teased you a little bit too much<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Geez, you surprised me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m sure it’s because you’re always watching us, right, Kotori-chan. I also want to know more about you, so I’ll be watching you lots too♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Y-, you’re teasing me again, Nozomi-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
